item.description: [b]This is a special invite for Worcester Photo Center Members- but you need to RSVP and sign up on the offical PhotoShop World Web site listed below!!! Cost: Students are 150.00 all others are 699.00 (but you can get 100.00 off for signing up early before Feb 20th and this offer gets you an extra 50.00 off!)[/b] PHOTOSHOP WORLD INVITES WORCESTER PHOTOGRAPHY CENTER MEMBERS WITH EXTRA $50 Take your passion for photography a notch higher and have a blast doing so! Adobe and the National Association of Photoshop Professionals (NAPP) would like to invite all members of the Worcester Photography Center to join us this spring in Boston at our Photoshop World Conference & Expo < http://www.photoshopworld.com > on March 25-27, 2009. Photoshop World is a three-day, non-stop learning experience overflowing with digital photography and Photoshop classes that will take your skills and creativity to entirely new levels. As a Worcester Photography Center member, we are pleased to offer you an extra special $50 admission discount (use promo code PE09-AOCM when registering). Add this discount to our “early bird” discount of $100 and you save $150 off registration < http://www.photoshopworld.com/register.html > when you sign up before February 20, 2009. Plus, your registration includes a one-year NAPP membership (if you are not a current member). Visit www.PhotoshopWorld.com to download the conference brochure and see a complete list of instructors, classes, and special events. Sign up by February 20th to save $150 on admission. Call 800-738-8513 M-F, 8:30am – 7:00pm EST, or visit us online at www.PhotoshopWorld.com < https://www.photoshopworld.com/register.html >.

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: PHOTOSHOP WORLD INVITES WORCESTER PHOTOGRAPHY CENTER MEMBERS WITH EXTRA $50
